scripts.deploy:acme: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AcmeCompany.ts --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/export-addresses.ts --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/verify-deployment.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:anvil: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AcmeCompany.ts --network anvil && npx hardhat run scripts/export-addresses.ts --network anvil && npx hardhat run scripts/verify-deployment.ts --network anvil
scripts.export: npx ts-node scripts/export-abis.ts && npx hardhat run scripts/export-addresses.ts
